00011 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_UNION_HPP_INCLUDED
00012 #define BOOST_TT_IS_UNION_HPP_INCLUDED
00013 
00014 #include "boost/type_traits/remove_cv.hpp"
00015 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00016 #include "boost/type_traits/intrinsics.hpp"
00017 
00018 // should be the last #include
00019 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00020 
00021 namespace boost {
00022 
00023 namespace detail {
00024 #ifndef __GNUC__
00025 template <typename T> struct is_union_impl
00026 {
00027    typedef typename remove_cv<T>::type cvt;
00028    BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = BOOST_IS_UNION(cvt));
00029 };
00030 #else
00031 //
00032 // using remove_cv here generates a whole load of needless
00033 // warnings with gcc, since it doesn't do any good with gcc
00034 // in any case (at least at present), just remove it:
00035 //
00036 template <typename T> struct is_union_impl
00037 {
00038    BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = BOOST_IS_UNION(T));
00039 };
00040 #endif
00041 } // namespace detail
00042 
00043 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_union,T,::boost::detail::is_union_impl<T>::value)
00044 
00045 } // namespace boost
00046 
00047 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
00048 
00049 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_UNION_HPP_INCLUDED
